page.title: 03FARMS AROUND BOROUGHBRIDGE
page.content: The farms around Boroughbridge consist of different land.Some farmers use land to grow grass for Silage and for cattle.Most land is used for crops,like Oil Seed Rape,Sugar beet,Corn,Barley,Oats and Potatoes.A lot of farmers use four wheel drive tractors for more power pulling the plough over rough terrain.To stop weeds killing crops chemicals are used to kill the weeds.This has helped the farmers a lot but they haveto keep the chemicals away from children or animals,like cows,sheep,pigs and hens.Farmers mostly keep cows and sheep but they also keep pigs and hens.There are a lot of cattle farmers and these farmers are in Dairy and Beef.
